comments.body: Why have you removed the entry for ppc64le?
The Cuda10 images for ppc64le doesn't seem to be available: https://hub.docker.com/r/nvidia/cuda-ppc64le/

Why not retain ppcie with an older CUDA version? Also we need to set up continuous builds and update the test to use the latest image instead of having to manually update everytime a new cuda release is made.
Automation can happen outside of this PR thought.
Added back ppc64le with Cuda 9.2 and updated README accordingly.

> The Cuda10 images for ppc64le doesn't seem to be available: https://hub.docker.com/r/nvidia/cuda-ppc64le/

Its not true, I see ppc image available and I can able to pull it as well.

```
root@localhost:~# docker pull nvidia/cuda-ppc64le:10.0-devel-ubuntu18.04
10.0-devel-ubuntu18.04: Pulling from nvidia/cuda-ppc64le
```

@jiayingz lets update ppc64le image as well.
